mapper.sql: staff_id, province_id, city_id, region_id, org_id, staff_type, status, sex, name, mobile, tel, addr, birth, work_year, card_id, nation, edu, astro, blood_type, head_img, intro, add_time, update_time, parent_org_id, level
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT (p.staff_id) FROM org_staffs AS p JOIN org_staff_skill AS m ON p.staff_id = m.staff_id WHERE p.org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND m.service_type_id = #{serviceTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from org_staffs where staff_id in (select user_id from user_push_bind where device_type = 'android')

select
from org_staffs where staff_type = 0 and staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType = NUMERIC}

select
from org_staffs where staff_type = 0 and status = 1

select
from org_staffs where staff_type = 0 and status = 1 and org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType = NUMERIC}

select
from org_staffs where staff_id in ( select distinct auth.staff_id from org_staff_auth as auth where auth.service_type_id in (0,14) and auth.aut_status = 1 );

select
from org_staffs where staff_id in ( select distinct auth.staff_id from org_staff_auth as auth where auth.service_type_id in (0,12) and auth.aut_status = 1 );

select
from org_staffs where status = 1 and org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

select
from org_staffs where org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and staff_type = 1 and status = 1

select
from org_staffs where staff_id in
#{item}
order by add_time asc

select
from org_staffs order by add_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into org_staffs (staff_id, province_id, city_id, region_id, org_id, staff_type, status, sex, name, mobile, tel, addr, birth, work_year, card_id, nation, edu, astro, blood_type, head_img, intro, add_time, update_time, parent_org_id, level ) values (#{staffId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cityId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{regionId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{staffType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sex,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{workYear,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{astro,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{level,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )

mapper.update:
update org_staffs
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
staff_type = #{staffType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
status = #{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE},
work_year = #{workYear,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edu = #{edu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
astro = #{astro,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
blood_type = #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
parent_org_id = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
level = #{level,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update org_staffs set province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, staff_type = #{staffType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, status = #{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, work_year = #{workYear,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edu = #{edu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, astro = #{astro,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, blood_type = #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, parent_org_id = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, level = #{level,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
